První případ nákazy koronavirem v Česku!: The first case of Covid in Czechia!
<p>Řešení této situace máte teď ve svých:
How you deal with the situation is now up to you. Remember:

  • Different measures have different effects on how the disease spreads
  • It takes some time for the effects of a measure to show
  • For help click the question mark icons
  • Change the game speed using the bar above
Modrá barva značí nezávazné rady průvodc: Blue text is for advice and guidelines. Do what you will with them!
<p>Hlavní zdroj informací o aktuální sit:
The main source of current data on the situation in Czechia. You can switch between four graphs. The new infections graph is the most important one.

After the tutorial, click the question mark icon in this panel to read more.
Rychlost hry a základní statistiky (prvn: Game speed and main statistics (first panel)
<p>Tento panel umožňuje hru zrychlovat,:
Slow down or speed up the game, or pause it altogether.

You can also track social stability and hospital capacity here.

Make sure you know why social stability and hospital capacity matter - click the question mark icon in the speed bar.
<p>Zde naleznete svůj hlavní nástroj k z:
This is your main tool for managing the pandemic. Measures currently in effect are blue; grey measures are not currently being used.

Click the question mark in the measures tab to read more about measures and compensation.
<p>A tím končí naše krátká cesta po ovlá:
This is the end of our short intro to the game. When you press OK, managing the pandemic will be up to you. But don’t worry: we’ll try to offer guidance in any exceptional situations. Good luck!

After closing this window, launch the game in the bar above.
Vypadá to, že jste získali zpět důvěru o: It seems you’ve regained the citizens’ trust. No need to fear overly negative public reactions to new measures.
Lidem dochází trpělivost! Nevěří vládním: People are running out of patience! They don’t trust the government’s decisions.
Vaše volba opatření otřásla důvěrou obyv: Your choice of measures eroded public confidence in the measures. Don’t forget: measures affect social stability. If they’re too strict and stay in effect too long, people will get unhappy.
Pozor, ve společnosti to začíná vřít! Do: Careful, the people have reached a boiling point! We recommend looking at your social stability.
Opozice vyzývá vládu k rezignaci!: The opposition calls for the government to resign!
Pozor, situace je velmi špatná. Další po: Careful, the situation is really bad. More drops in stability can cause the game to end prematurely. What caused this? A high death rate shows a need for stricter measures. On the contrary, very strict measures might mean you need to lift or compensate them.
Česko se příliš zadlužuje!: Czechia is getting into too much debt!
Hra měří, jak moc zadlužujete stát i kol: The game measures the level of state debt, as well as losses for businesses caused by the situation and measures. Extremely high expenses can have a negative impact later on.
Krize má vysoké náklady. V tuto chvíli n: The costs of the crisis are very high. At the moment, the pandemic has cost us almost 50% of the Czech state budget for 2019.
Státní dluh je nejvyšší v historii!: The national debt is at an all-time high!
Výdaje spojené s pandemií koronaviru dos: Pandemic-related spending now equals the sum of all other government expenses. The national debt and unemployment levels have reached a record high; the value of the crown is dropping quickly.
Hrozba státního bankrotu a hyperinflace!: Danger of national bankruptcy and hyperinflation!
Běžná ekonomika je v troskách, řetězce v: The economy is in shambles; business supplier chains have ceased to exist. There is widespread social dissatisfaction.
Covid zabil {{stats.deaths.today}} lidí: In one day, Covid killed {{stats.deaths.today}} people.
Vypadá to, že to není pouhá chřipka. Je: It seems this is no ordinary flu. Consider using the top right tab and applying measures to mitigate the spread of the virus. Survivors will gain a temporary immunity.
Rekordní denní počet úmrtí nakažených co: A record high of Covid deaths per day
Stovka mrtvých denně zasévá do společnos: A hundred deaths a day make people wonder whether the government can handle the situation. Look at the top right tab to see whether your measures are sufficient.
{{stats.deaths.today}} mrtvých za den, v: {{stats.deaths.today}} dead per day; most crematoria are running out of capacity.
Takto rychlé přibývání obětí obyvatelstv: This death toll has shocked the citizens. They’re not likely to accept more casualties per day.
Temné predikce se naplnily: přes 1500 mr: The darkest forecasts have materialised: the daily death toll is over 1,500 Army deployed to dig mass graves.
Více než 1 500 mrtvých denně je na stát: Over 1,500 casualties per day is horrible news for a 10M state. The people are shocked.
Covid v Česku usmrtil přes 10 000 lidí: Covid has killed over 10,000 people in Czechia
Překonání hranice deseti tisíc mrtvých p: Crossing the threshold of 10,000 casualties made the public distrust the government. People are going to be more careful for a while, though. Both economic activity and the spread of Covid decrease for two weeks.
Další tragický milník: Česko překonalo h: Another tragic milestone: Czechia now has over 100,000 Covid deaths.
Sto tisíc mrtvých představuje tragické s: 100,000 deaths mean a tragic first place for Czechia and an unprecedented loss of life. This milestone makes the people despise the government, but they’ll be more careful for two weeks.
Demonstrace odpůrců vládních opatření: n: Protests against government measures: protesters not wearing masks, not social distancing
Demonstranti v centru Prahy nedodržují z: Protesters in the centre of Prague violating government measures. Arresting them might anger the public. If protests go on unchecked, there may be a spike in infections.
Nemocnice varují před náporem nemocných: Hospitals warn of influx of patients
Nemocnice mají jen omezenou kapacitu - a: Hospital capacity is limited: hospitals warn that if there are too many patients, they’ll be unable to provide care.
Pokud překročíte kapacitu nemocnic, smrt: If you exceed hospital capacity, mortality rates will shoot up.
Hygienické stanice přestávají stíhat: Public health offices fail to keep up
Státní hygienické stanice zvládnou v naš: In our game, public health offices can trace exactly 1000 people per day. If your number of daily cases exceeds that, tracing will start failing.
Překonání hranice tisíce nakažených denn: Crossing the limit of thousands of people infected every day and with it the fall of tracing can be a significant milestone in not coping with a pandemic. It is impossible to boost tracing capacity in our model state.
Tisíce obětí za poslední týden a mrtvých: Thousands of casualties last week and more deaths every day!
Kritická situace vede obyvatele k větší: The critical situation motivates citizens to self-isolate more when possible.
Izolace obyvatel znamená, že výrazně mén: This means they shop and work much less and are more careful. The spread of the disease will slow down, but no thanks to you.
Life in Czechia is coming back to normal.
Školáci dnes dostávají vysvědčení a začí: Last day of school; the summer holidays are starting.
Žáci a studenti se o prázdninách ve škol: Students don’t go to school during the holidays. “School closure” has been activated at no extra cost.
Prázdniny skončily a školáci se vrací do: The summer holidays are over; school's starting again. Will the situation deteriorate?
Opatření “uzavření škol” opět zvyšuje ná: The measure “School closure” will now cost money and lower social stability. You can keep the schools closed, but the measure won’t be automatic or free.
Virus se v teplém počasí hůř šíří. Vědci: The disease spreads slower in warm weather. Experts expect the pandemic to slow down.
V létě tráví lidé více času venku a šanc: People spend more time outside in the summer, so it’s less likely they’ll get infected. It might be time to lift some restrictions.
Chladné počasí pomáhá šíření koronaviru,: Epidemiologists: Covid spreads faster in colder weather
V chladném počasí se lidé více potkávají: When it’s cold, people meet in small spaces and the disease spreads faster. One person with Covid can infect more people. It might be time to introduce new measures.
<p>Několik dní před tím, než dostanou vy:
Students will get their final assessments soon, so it's time to assess your government’s pandemic performance so far.

By the 30th of June 2020, the real Czechia had 347 Covid-19 deaths. In your simulation, {{stats.deaths.total}} people have died.
První vlna může být překvapivá a nepříje: The first wave can be surprising and unpleasant. If you’re not happy with how you did and would like to try again, just press Restart. If you want to go on, press Keep going.
Ministr porušil svá vlastní pravidla, na: A minister broke his own rules by shopping without a mask.
Pokud ministr po porušení vlastních naří: If the minister keeps his job after breaking his own rules, citizens might protest, which will lower social stability. However, the dismissal of a minister who is already well-established in his work can significantly complicate the running of the ministry, including the vaccination process.
Nebudu se podřizovat bludům. Roušku odmí: I won’t submit to a hoax. No mask for me!
Celebrita veřejně odsuzuje nošení roušek: A celebrity took a public stand against masks and there’s several pictures of them in a shop without a mask. Some media outlets call for a fine.
Pokud osobnost nebude potrestána, může t: If the star is not punished, it may make the citizens less disciplined and cause Covid to spread faster. However, the punishment might outrage their fans and decrease social stability.
Potrestat celebritu jako ostatní: Fine the celebrity like anyone else
Jeden z našich dodavatelů lékařského vyb: One of our medical equipment suppliers’ prices are much higher than normal, but we depend on their supply. The change may mean a short-term supply disruption and with it a faster spread of the disease.
Pokud budeme nadále setrvávat s dosavadn: If we keep the current supplier, we’ll lose more money on the overpriced purchases. Without these supplies, coronavirus will spread faster.
Zažije Česko první místní volby ve zname: Will Czechia have the first local elections haunted by Covid?
Radikální proměny volebního procesu obyv: Radical changes to the voting process will provoke outrage and erode public trust. If elections take place as usual, infection rate might soar.
Nedávná výměna ministra způsobila zmatky: Recent changes at the ministry cause vaccination chaos.
Vláda se zabývá možností otevření skiaeá: The government considers reopening ski resorts.
Otevření skiareálů? Vlekaři volají po vý: Open ski resorts? Owners calling for an exception, epidemiologists say no!
Zavření skiareálů rozčílí hodně lidí a p: Closing down ski resorts will upset many people and take away their favourite winter sports. Opening might increase Covid risks.
Vánoce během koronaviru: Jaké svátky nás: Christmas under Covid: What will the holidays be like?
Pro období svátků je možné zavést speciá: You can introduce new restrictions for the holiday season (to prevent gatherings) or grant new exceptions.
Výjimku z opatření velká část obyvatel o: Most of the population will appreciate an exception, but more gatherings will mean more infections. You can mitigate the spread of Covid with stricter measures, but that might upset people.
Jak česko oslaví příchod nového roku?: How will Czechia celebrate New Year’s?
Pro období svátků je možné zpřísnit opat: You can introduce new restrictions for the holiday season (to prevent gatherings) or grant new exceptions.
Povolit večerní vycházení na Silvestra: Let people go out at night for New Year’s
Únik dat z očkovacího registračního syst: A leak of data from the vaccination registration system can cause a lot of harm on all sides. If you admit the mistake, people will be outraged. If you deny it, one of two things can happen: Either the lie will be exposed and the outrage will be much greater, or you’ll get away with it, a few will grumble, but the nation will be appeased.
Odhalení fatální bezpečnostní díry očkov: Fatal security flaw in the vaccination system revealed
Okamžité stažení systému je bezpečná var: Retracting the system immediately is safe, but it would cause a two-week delay to the vaccination. If you try to reassure the citizens, deny the issue and keep the system running, the vulnerable system might be hacked (but it might not), causing a much longer delay.
Hackeři zaútočili na systém registrace o: Hackers have attacked the vaccination registration system
Hackeři vyžadují výkupné za napadený sys: They demand a ransom for the hacked system. You can either pay the ransom or refuse - but repairing the damage will take a week and vaccination registrations won't work in that time.
Novinář odhalil masivní únik dat z očkov: The press uncovered a massive data leak from the vaccination system.
Únik dat z očkovacího registračního se n: Keeping the registration system data leak secret failed.
Bezpečnostní chyba způsobila zhroucení o: The vaccination system crashed due to a security flaw.
Nová mutace viru se šíří rychleji. Dejte: The new virus mutation spreads faster. Keep an eye on the infection rate and consider applying stricter measures.
Zmutovaný koronavirus v zemi dominuje!: Mutated Covid strains dominant in Czechia!
Nová mutace viru už je v zemi hojně rozš: The new virus mutation is now widespread. Covid is much more infectious now.
Testování vakcín v poslední fázi. Státy: Last stage of vaccine testing. EU states order millions of vaccines
Úspěšný vývoj vakcín a jejich nákup nabí: Buying successfully developed vaccines means a chance for immunity without illness. People see the light at the end of the tunnel. Your ministry is not in charge of vaccine distribution, only promotion. Your colleagues will manage the distribution and everything else regardless of your actions. You just need to hold on now.
Zmírní kampaň obavy z očkování proti cov: Will a campaign mitigate vaccination concerns?
Je třeba se rozhodnout, zda budou invest: You need to decide whether you’ll invest in promoting Covid vaccination.
Investice do kampaně pro očkování zvýší: Investing in a PR campaign will increase the demand for vaccination and speed up the process. It will, however, be an additional costs, and you risk it will just upset people more.
We meant well, but it turned out... well, bad.
Každá propagační kampaň v sobě nese rizi: Every PR campaign carries a risk of failure. This was that failure.
Lidé mají strach, že nová vakcína proti: People are afraid the new Covid vaccine has not been tested enough and reject the vaccine.
Lidé se bojí. Rychlost vakcinace se na k: People are afraid. Vaccination slows down significantly for a short time.
Lékař zemřel po očkování: A doctor died after getting the vaccine
Lékař v USA zemřel po očkování. Detaily: A doctor in the US died after vaccination. Details are currently unknown; citizens now fear the vaccine.
Horečky, průjmy: Občané popisují první p: Fever, diarrhea: Citizens describe the first side effects of the vaccine
Lidé mají strach z vedlejších účinků očk: People reject the vaccine out of fear of side effects.
Lékař ukázal pět jednoduchých triků jak: A doctor shows five simple tricks for curing Covid at home
Kardiolog na svém populárním blogu dokaz: A cardiologist’s popular blog proves that the majority of people can easily cure Covid on their own without any vaccination.
The vaccination campaign has stopped working
Tři sousední země překročily hranici 75%: Three neighbouring states exceed 75% vaccination coverage
Sousední země mají proočkováno a nabízej: Neighbouring countries have vaccinated their populations and offer help to Czechia.
Přijetí zahraniční pomoci urychlí vakcin: Accepting international aid will speed up vaccination and raise vaccination coverage by several percentage points. Rejecting it will upset some of the citizens.
Half the population has been vaccinated.
Pokud se teď opatření nerozvolní, neotev: If restrictions are not relaxed now, we’ll never reopen.
Kavárník Pavel: „S bratrem jsme si splni: Pavel, a café owner: “It was our dream for me and my brother. We found a great space, invested a lot of money and work. Now we’re struggling to pay rent.”
Přibývá lidí, kteří se nyní musí obávat: More and more people fear for their livelihoods and futures. Financial aid for them will mean a major expense. If you refuse to help, many businesses will fail.
Diváci si zvykají na svůj obývák a Netfl: Viewers get used to their Netflix and couch
Producenti posouvají premiéry na další r: Producers move opening nights to the next year or the Internet. Will Covid kill cinemas? Owners call for loans for the next two years.
Pandemie vyprázdnila multikina i místní: The pandemic has emptied cinemas and there are not even that many films. Loans can save cinemas from bankruptcy, but will the money ever return?
„Kousli jsme se. Další vlnu už ale nezvl: “We tightened our belts, but we won’t survive another wave.”
Martin a Petra vedou malou hračkářskou d: Martin and Petra have a small toy workshop. But their online sales don’t earn enough to cover their employees’ wages.
Situace těžce dopadá na drobné podnikate: The situations is especially tough for small businessmen who struggle to pay wages. If you don’t help them, many won’t survive.
Krámky na rohu jsou prázdné, velké řetěz: Small shops stand empty, large chains count profits.
Místní podniky nedokáží konkurovat nabíd: Local shops can't compete with the offer and delivery options big corporations have. Financial aid for them will mean a major expense. If you don’t help them, many won’t survive.
Vláda padla kvůli fatálnímu neúspěchu př: The government fell due to a fatal failure to address the coronavirus crisis
Vaše hra v roli vlády skončila. Hodnota: Your game as the government is over. Social stability reached its minimum, the government fell and you lost your chance to influence how the Covid-19 pandemic is managed.
Proč se tak stalo? Jedním z důvodů může: Why did it happen? One reason might be that you had very strict measures in force for too long. Stability also goes down faster when the death rate gets too high to be acceptable for the public.
<p>Připravili jsme pro vás scénář simula:
This is a simulation of the current situation in Czechia

In the middle of February, the “British variant” B.1.1.7 dominated older variants and the resproduction number significantly increased. Also, many exceptions to the mitigation measures were implemented since the beginning of the year.
Od 1. 3. 2021 vstupují v účinnost nová v: New anti-covid measures are taking effect form 03/01/2021. In our simulation, we mostly assume these measure revoke some of the earlier exceptions to the rules (e.g. reopening some businesses and schools for some grades).
